get.description: Users API endpoint performs a LinearB users paginated search

post.description: Users API endpoint performs a LinearB users creation.

delete.description: Users API endpoint performs a LinearB delete user.

patch.description: Users API endpoint performs a LinearB update user. Note: if custom_info is not provided, it will not be overwritten.

get.description: Teams V2 API endpoint performs a LinearB teams paginated search

post.description:
Get V2 metrics endpoint

This API can be used in order to extract metrics data from LinearB on the fly.
It can be used to retrieve all metrics and for those that are supported,
the aggregation of p75, p50 and avg can be chosen.

schema.title: Response Post Metrics Api V2 Measurements Post

post.description:
Export V2 metrics endpoint

This API can be used in order to export metrics V2 data in CSV/JSON format.

204.description: No Content. Does not exist or has expired

This model ovverides default functionality and remove nullable field from dict object

:param BaseModel: the BaseModel

DateFilter.title: DateFilter
DateFilter.description:
This model ovverides default functionality and remove nullable field from dict object

:param BaseModel: the BaseModel

group_by.description: Field to group by. One of organization, team, contributor, repository

contributor_ids.title: Contributor Ids
contributor_ids.description: Array of contributors to filter by.

repository_ids.title: Repository Ids
repository_ids.description: Array of repositories to filter by.

team_ids.title: Team Ids
team_ids.description: Should be passed when requesting group_by equals team.

service_ids.title: Service Ids
service_ids.description: Array of services to filter by.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Max amount of objects in the response. When request for multiple contributors, teams or repositories, limit should be more or equal of amount of passed ids (or data will be returned partially)

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: Used for pagination, defines the offset for the query.

labels.title: Labels
labels.description: If the grouping is based on labels, the results will be grouped according to the specified labels. For other group by values, the results will be filtered based on the provided labels.

return_no_data.title: Return No Data
return_no_data.description: If set to true, will return contributors or teams that dont have data in case of group by contributor and team

beautified.title: Beautified
beautified.description: Defaults to false, will format the data in case of CSV to a more readable format

SearchTeamsPartialResponseModel.title: SearchTeamsPartialResponseModel
SearchTeamsPartialResponseModel.description: Search teams response with full data

partial.title: Partial data response flag
partial.description: Partial data response flag defines the output schema. If it is False, then will return full teams objects data. Otherwise only mappings for teams, contributors ids and names

keyword.title: Keyword to search by in a teams names
keyword.description: When passed will filter teams by matches keyword with names (using type `keyword_match_type`)

keyword_match_type.title: Type of the keyword search match
keyword_match_type.description: Defines type of a match when search by keyword in teams names. Supports `matches` (exact team name match), `contains` (keyword is included in the team name string) and `startswith`(team name starts with a keyword)

offset.title: Pagination offset
offset.description: Offset(start position) of each pagination step

limit.title: Pagination limit
limit.description: Limit of teams to return for each pagination step

nonmerged_members_only.title: Non Merged Members Flag
nonmerged_members_only.description: If True, will return only contributors, that does not have parent contributor. Otherwise, will return only parents and stand-alone contributors

TeamV2CreationModel.title: TeamV2CreationModel

name.title: Name
name.description: Team name must be at least 3 characters long, start with a letter

parent_team.title: Parent Team
parent_team.description: Team parent name must be at least 3 characters long, start with a letter

initials.title: Initials
initials.description: Team initials must be 1 to 3 characters long and contain only letters or numbers.

color.title: Color
color.description: Team color must be a valid hex code in the format #RGB or #RRGGBB.

TeamV2CreationModel.description:
Model for creating a team.

:param name: Team name, required, must be at least 3 characters and start with a letter.
:type name: str
:param parent_team: Optional parent team name, must be at least 3 characters and start with a letter.
:type parent_team: Optional[str]
:param initials: Optional team initials, 1 to 3 alphanumeric characters.
:type initials: Optional[str]
:param color: Optional team color in hex format (#RGB or #RRGGBB). Defaults to '#3B48B3'.
:type color: Optional[str]

Extra fields are not permitted.

TeamV2Model.title: TeamV2Model

color.title: Color
color.description: The team's color in hex format

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: The timestamp when the team was created

deleted_at.title: Deleted At
deleted_at.description: The timestamp when the team was deleted, if applicable

established_at.title: Established At
established_at.description: The timestamp when the team was established

extra.title: Extra
extra.description: Additional custom information about the team

id.title: Id
id.description: The unique identifier of the team

organization_id.title: Organization Id
organization_id.description: The ID of the organization this team belongs to

parent_id.title: Parent Id
parent_id.description: The ID of the parent team, if this team is a sub-team

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: The ID of the associated project, if any

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: The timestamp when the team was last updated

contributors.title: Contributors
contributors.description: List of contributors associated with the team

TeamV2Model.description:
Model representing a team in the system.

Attributes:
    id (int): The unique identifier of the team.
    organization_id (int): The ID of the organization this team belongs to.
    name (str): The name of the team.
    color (Optional[str]): The team's color in hex format.
    created_at (str): The timestamp when the team was created.
    updated_at (Optional[str]): The timestamp when the team was last updated.
    deleted_at (Optional[str]): The timestamp when the team was deleted, if applicable.
    established_at (Optional[str]): The timestamp when the team was established.
    initials (Optional[str]): The team's initials (1-3 characters).
    parent_id (Optional[int]): The ID of the parent team, if this team is a sub-team.
    project_id (Optional[int]): The ID of the associated project, if any.
    extra (Optional[Dict]): Additional custom information about the team.

TeamV2PatchModel.title: TeamV2PatchModel

name.title: Name
name.description: Team name must be at least 3 characters long, start with a letter

parent_team.title: Parent Team
parent_team.description: Team parent name must be at least 3 characters long, start with a letter

initials.title: Initials
initials.description: Team initials must be 1 to 3 characters long and contain only letters or numbers.

color.title: Color
color.description: Team color must be a valid hex code in the format #RGB or #RRGGBB.

TeamV2PatchModel.description:
Model for patching a team. All fields are optional but at least one must be provided.
Inherits all validation rules from TeamV2CreationModel.

TeamsV2PaginatedResponseModel.title: TeamsV2PaginatedResponseModel
TeamsV2PaginatedResponseModel.description:
A paginated response model specifically for Teams V2 API.

This model represents a paginated response containing a list of teams and their total count.
It is specifically designed for the Teams V2 API endpoints to provide consistent pagination
structure across team-related responses.

Attributes:
    total (int): The total number of teams available across all pages.
        This count represents the complete dataset size, not just the current page.

    items (List[TeamV2Model]): The list of teams in the current page.

issued_at.title: Issued At
issued_at.description: The incident was open at this specific time, can be ISO8601 or EPOCH timestmap

started_at.title: Started At
started_at.description: The incident was started at this specific time, can be ISO8601 or EPOCH timestmap

ended_at.title: Ended At
ended_at.description: The incident was resolved at this specific time, can be ISO8601 or EPOCH timestmap

git_ref.title: Git Ref
git_ref.description: The git reference of the release,                                                i.e. commit short or long sha or tag name

teams.description: The list of LinearB teams names related to this incident

services.title: Services
services.description: The list of LinearB services monitoring this incident

repository_urls.title: Repository Urls
repository_urls.description: The list of repos urls related to this incident

repositories.title: Repositories
repositories.description: List of repositories in the service

name.description: username must be at least 3 characters long, start with a letter

id.description: The unique identifier of the user

extra.description: Additional custom information about the user

UserModel.description:
Model representing a user in the system.

Attributes:
    id (int): The unique identifier of the user.
    organization_id (str): The ID of the organization this user belongs to.
    name (str): The full name of the user.
    email (str): The user's email address.
    avatar_url (Optional[str]): URL to the user's avatar image.
    extra (Optional[Dict]): Additional custom information about the user.
    created_at (str): The timestamp when the user was created.
    updated_at (Optional[str]): The timestamp when the user was last updated.
    deleted_at (Optional[str]): The timestamp when the user was deleted, if applicable.
    team_membership (List[Dict]): List of teams the user belongs to.
    user_type_id (Optional[int]): The type identifier for this user.
    connected_users (ConnectedUsersModel): Information about connected user accounts.
    permissions (Dict): User's permission settings.

name.title: Name
name.description: username must be at least 3 characters long, start with a letter

UsersPaginatedResponseModel.title: UsersPaginatedResponseModel
UsersPaginatedResponseModel.description:
A paginated response model specifically for Users API.

This model represents a paginated response containing a list of users and their total count.
It is specifically designed for the Users API endpoints to provide consistent pagination
structure across user-related responses.

Attributes:
    total (int): The total number of users available across all pages.
        This count represents the complete dataset size, not just the current page.

    items (List[UserModel]): The list of users in the current page.
